channel.title: career development on hexdevs
channel.description: Recent content in career development on hexdevs

item.title: Climb your Way Up to Senior Ruby Dev with Fabiano Beselga
item.description: How do you get promoted to Senior level? How do Engineering paths work? Fabiano Beselga answered the most common questions about Ruby career promotions, climbing up the Engineering Ladder, and how to get to Senior level. Watch the conversation now!

item.title: International Pricing for Ruby and Rails Books and Courses
item.description: Living in a country whose currency is undervalued, which makes it hard for you to afford a course priced in US dollars? Here's a list of resources that offer discounts for Ruby and Rails developers who earn a local wage (outside of the US). The list includes one-time fee and monthly subscriptions.
